commands.name: az networkcloud clustermanager identity assign
commands.summary: Assign the user or system managed identities.
commands.syntax:
az networkcloud clustermanager identity assign --cluster-manager-name
                                               --resource-group
                                               [--mi-system-assigned]
                                               [--mi-user-assigned]
                                               [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]

commands.name: az networkcloud clustermanager identity remove
commands.summary: Remove the user or system managed identities.
commands.syntax:
az networkcloud clustermanager identity remove --cluster-manager-name
                                               --resource-group
                                               [--mi-system-assigned]
                                               [--mi-user-assigned]
                                               [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]

commands.name: az networkcloud clustermanager identity show
commands.summary: Show the details of managed identities.

commands.name: az networkcloud clustermanager identity wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
